title: NZ Civil Aviation Rules December 2025 Update
description: Comprehensive overview of the December 2025 updates to New Zealand Civil Aviation Rules, covering the new Part 107 Research & Development framework, enhanced Part 101 and Part 102 requirements, and practical compliance guidance for drone operators.
author: DroneTrust

modules.title: Overview and Part 107 Introduction
modules.description: Learn what changed in December 2025 and understand the new Part 107 Research & Development framework for advanced aviation.

modules.title: Parts 101 and 102 Updates
modules.description: Explore the enhanced distinctions between Part 101 operating rules and Part 102 certification requirements, including the new Transport Instrument framework.

lessons.title: Part 101: Unmanned Aircraft Operating Rules Updates

modules.title: Compliance and Transition
modules.description: Master the transition process with AC101-1 guidance and practical compliance steps to ensure your operations meet the new requirements.

prerequisites: Familiarity with NZ Civil Aviation Authority regulations
learningObjectives: Understand the three major rule updates effective December 22, 2025
Explain the purpose and benefits of the new Part 107 Research & Development framework
Distinguish between Part 101 and Part 102 operational requirements
Navigate the transition period using Advisory Circular AC101-1
Implement practical compliance steps for your drone operations
Prepare for future regulatory developments in advanced aviation
